name: Krazy Kopter
overview: Krazy Kopter is a basic shooter with three levels and difficult controls; you maneuver a helicopter over a ridge with bridges crossing it, you can drop one bomb at a time, and your job is to eliminate the fast moving cars on the bridges. If you miss even a single car you lose a life. When a bomb is dropped you must wait for it to cover the entire distance of the screen, so if you miss at all it can be very difficult to catch a car before it crosses.
